# RT Detail - Premium Automotive Detailing Landing Page

## Project Overview
Ultra-modern, cinematic landing page for RT Detail automotive detailing workshop.

## Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- TailwindCSS
- Framer Motion
- GSAP + ScrollTrigger
- Three.js

## Design Principles
- Dark, elegant, premium aesthetic
- Cinematic scrolling experience
- Advanced motion design
- Non-conventional layouts
- Performance optimized

## Color Palette
- Deep Black: #0d0d0d
- Graphite Gray
- Clean White
- Metallic accents

## Status
In development
